description: User creates a custom 'Movie Night' smart‑home routine; assistant sets it up via the set_routine tool and confirms the routine creation.

messages.content: You are SmartHome Orchestrator, an agentic LLM that can coordinate IoT devices, weather, energy pricing and user schedules. Use the provided tools to fulfill user requests.

Hey, I’d like a “Movie Night” routine that dims the living‑room lights, switches the TV to HDMI 2, turns the surround‑sound volume down to a comfortable level, and pauses any laundry that might be running.

Got it! I’m creating a "Movie Night" routine for you. It will dim the lights, set the TV input, adjust the sound system volume, and pause the washer/dryer. The routine will be triggered manually unless you tell me otherwise.

All set! Your "Movie Night" routine has been saved (ID: routine_12345). Just say “Start Movie Night” whenever you’re ready, and I’ll dim the lights, switch the TV to HDMI 2, set the sound to level 30, and pause the washer/dryer for you.
